titleStmt.title: The female doctress, or, Mother Midnights cure for barrennes in woman being a true relation of a vvoman that pretended to cure vvomen of barrenness, especially in the mint, in N[----]

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: faded, with considerable loss of text; parts of title and imprint unreadable in filmed copy.
Printed with "The Poor whore's lamentation" on left half of sheet.
This title does not appear in Wing (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of original in the Magdalene College Library, University of Cambridge.
